name: The Scary Momo’s House
description:
Welcome to the scary momo’s house.
The scary momo is a landlord of the haunted evil house. She likes to live alone and want to keep innocent locked in the house. So you have to be quiet when you enter the house because she can hear everything in the horror night. In this creepy midnight, momo set some traps for unexpected arrivals. You have to care about the traps and don’t fall into one of the trap.
Don’t make any noise and hide whenever you hear incoming footsteps. The creepy granny wandering in the horror night and will attempt to eradicate you on first sight. Be careful not to attract her attention and leave the house before it’s too late.
Good Luck!
Features:
• Horror and Curious Level Based Game.
• Fearful and Creepy Environment.
• High-Quality Sound Effect that will grab your attention.
